attributes.action: remove all subsidies and perks from mps immediately
attributes.additional_details: as the government rely on the tax payers for there money then they should remove their subsidies and payments for second homes ,fuel and council tax, phone bills, food subsidies etc to help the tax payers to reduce the burden. if the public have to pay for everything when the earn above the minimum wage so should the mps. why should tax payers cover their bills ? They have  more than enough money to pay for their own bills.
attributes.background: level the playing fields if everyone has to tighten their belt for this black hole in the economy then the government should lead by example. if a minister wants a beautician ,new clothes,glasses they should pay them selves stop scrounging of the tax payer
